com.simplegeo.client.http
Class OAuthHttpClient

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.http.impl.client.AbstractHttpClient
      org.apache.http.impl.client.DefaultHttpClient
          com.simplegeo.client.http.OAuthHttpClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.http.client.HttpClient
public class OAuthHttpClient
extends org.apache.http.impl.client.DefaultHttpClient

A subclass of DefaultHttpClient that signs requests using a given OAuth key and secret.

Author:
Derek Smith

Constructor Summary
OAuthHttpClient()
          Initializes the object with a null token value.
OAuthHttpClient(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String secret)
          Initializes the object with a key/secret pair that will be used to sign requests.

executeOAuthRequest

public java.lang.Object executeOAuthRequest(org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpUriRequest request,
                                            org.apache.http.client.ResponseHandler<java.lang.Object> responseHandler)
                                     throws oauth.signpost.exception.OAuthMessageSignerException,
                                            oauth.signpost.exception.OAuthCommunicationException,
                                            oauth.signpost.exception.OAuthExpectationFailedException,
                                            org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                                            java.io.IOException
Signs the Http request with the registered token before execution.

Parameters:
request - the request that will be sent
responseHandler - the handler that will be used on a successful response
Returns:
an Object that was created by the handler
Throws:
oauth.signpost.exception.OAuthMessageSignerException
oauth.signpost.exception.OAuthCommunicationException
oauth.signpost.exception.OAuthExpectationFailedException
org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
